entry.title: leetcode 每日一题 （368）
entry.content:
368. 最大整除子集

给你一个由 无重复 正整数组成的集合 nums ，请你找出并返回其中最大的整除子集 answer ，子集中每一元素对 (answer[i], answer[j]) 都应当满足：

  • answer[i] % answer[j] == 0 ，或
  • answer[j] % answer[i] == 0

如果存在多个有效解子集，返回其中任何一个均可。

示例 1：

输入：nums = [1,2,3]
输出：[1,2]
解释：[1,3] 也会被视为正确答案。

示例 2：

输入：nums = [1,2,4,8]
输出：[1,2,4,8]

提示：

  • 1 <= nums.length <= 1000
  • 1 <= nums[i] <= 2 * 10910^9109
  • nums 中的所有整数 互不相同

思路

子集中的每个元素之间可以互相整除也就是互为倍数关系

那么 subset ,针对新的元素n，满足如下条件

n可以被subset内所有元素整除，也就是subset中最大的元素可以整除新元素n

题意中需要输出最长的subset,那么需要实时记录当前最长subset的大小。

dp：算法流程

dp:算法

class Solution {
public:
vector<int> largestDivisibleSubset(vector<int>& nums) {
    int n=nums.size();
    vector<vector<int>> dp;

    sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());
    int c=max(1,2);
    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        vector<int> temp;
        temp.push_back(nums[i]);
        dp.push_back(temp);
    }
    int maxlen=0;
    int maxindex=0;
    for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        for (int j = i-1; j >= 0 ; --j) {
            if (nums[i]%nums[j]==0&&dp[j].size()+1>dp[i].size())
            {
                dp[i]=dp[j];
                dp[i].push_back(nums[i]);
                if(dp[i].size()>maxlen)
                {
                    maxlen=dp[i].size();
                    maxindex=i;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return dp[maxindex];
}
};

entry.title: 单向链表
entry.content:
节点类：

/*节点类*/
class Node{
public:
    int data;//数据
    Node* next;//指针
    /*构造*/
    Node() :data(0),next(nullptr){};
    Node(int data): data(data),next(nullptr){};
    /*析构*/
    ~Node(){};
};

链表类

class Linklist{
private:
    Node* head;
};

链表中主要的就是头指针。其内部成员函数受链表结构影响 稍有不同，详见如下

1.带头节点


特点 ：头指针指向一个节点，但这个节点不存储数据，真正的链表节点从1号节点开始。头指针中存储的是头节点的地址。

class Linklist{
public:
    Linklist();//构造
    ~Linklist();//析构
    int GetLength();//链表长度
    int CreateLinkList(int size);//创建链表
    void showLinkList();//显示
    Node* FindInList(int data);//查找
    void InsertElemAtEnd(int data);            //在尾部插入指定的元素
    void InsertElemAtIndex(int data,int n);    //在指定位置插入指定元素
    void InsertElemAtHead(int data);           //在头部插入指定元素
    void DeleteElemAtEnd();       //在尾部删除元素
    void DeleteElemAtPoint(int data);     //删除指定的数据
    void DeleteElemAtHead();      //在头部删除节点
    Node* reserverlinklist();     //反转链表
private:
    Node* head;
};
构造函数（初始化链表Linklist();）

由于是带头节点 所以析构函数 Linklist();

Linklist::Linklist() {//初始化部分
    cout<<"linklist Constructor"<<endl;
    head=new Node;
    head->data=0;
    head->next= nullptr;

链表初始化后结构为

  • 头指针指向一个节点
  • 节点内不存放任何数据（当然也可作为节点个数的计数器）
创建链表（ CreateLinkList）
int Linklist::CreateLinkList(int size) {
   /*输入判断*/
    if(size<0)
    {
        cout<<"input error"<<endl;
        exit(-1);
    }
   /*输入合法*/
    Node* ptemp= nullptr;
    Node* pnew= nullptr;
   0 ptemp=head;
    for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
    {
   1     pnew=new Node;
   2     cout<<"intput the No "<<i+1<<" element"<<endl;
   3     cin>>pnew->data;
   4     pnew->next= nullptr;
   5     ptemp->next=pnew;
   6     ptemp=pnew;
    }
    cout<<"创建完成"<<endl;
    return 0;
}

由上解释0-6实现原理

    1. 将头指针给ptemp
    1. 创建一个新的节点，地址给pnew
  • 3-4. 对这个节点的数据输入，和next指针定向.
    1. 将pnew,也就是新节点地址给ptemp->next
    1. Ptemp指向刚刚生成的节点
获取链表长度int GetLength();
int Linklist::GetLength() {//获得链表长度
    int size=0;//计数
    Node* p=head->next;//
    while(p!= nullptr)
    {
        size++;
        p=p->next;
    }
    return size;
}

将头节点的next（指向下一个节点地址）

while循环保证某个节点后面还有节点

计数并将p指向下一个节点地址

显示链表里的内容showLinklist()
void Linklist::showLinkList() {
    if(head->next==nullptr)//头为空
    {
        cout<<"The Linklist is empty"<<endl;
    }
    Node * p =head->next;
    while (p!=nullptr)
    {
        cout<<p->data<<"->";
        p = p->next;
    }
    cout<<"null"<<endl;
}

判断节点是否为空：

然后如同计数一样一样循环显示即可

找到链表中某个数的位置
Node* Linklist::FindInList(int data) {
    Node * p = head;
    if (p==nullptr)
    {
        cout<<"The Linklist is empty"<<endl;
        return nullptr;
    }
    else
    {
        while(p->next!= nullptr)
        {
            if(p->data == data)
            {
                return p;
            }
            p=p->next;
        }
    }
    if(p->data == data)//头节点也有数据
    {
        return p;
    }
    else
    {
        return nullptr;
    }
}

思想和计数以及显示类似不过多赘述

在尾部添加节点 InsertElemAtEnd(int data)
void Linklist::InsertElemAtEnd(int data)          //在尾部插入指定的元素
{
    Node* newnode=new Node;
    newnode->next= nullptr;
    newnode->data=data;
    Node* p=head;
    if(head->next== nullptr)
    {
        head->next=newnode;
    }
    while(p->next!= nullptr)
    {
        p=p->next;
    }
    p->next=newnode;
}

首先先生成节点并存储数据后

之后确定当前链表的最后位置在哪里，将生成的新节点添加在原链表的最后面；

指定位置添加 InsertElemAtIndex(int data,int n)
void Linklist::InsertElemAtIndex(int data,int n)   //在指定位置插入指定元素
{
    if(n<1||n>GetLength())
    {
        cout<<"input error"<<endl;
    }
    else
    {   Node* newnode=new Node;
        newnode->data=data;
        Node* p=head->next;//p指向第一个节点的地址
        int i=1;
        while (n>i)
        {
            i++;
            p=p->next;
        }
        newnode->next=p->next;//p指向的是第n个节点p->next存放着n+1节点的地址
        p->next=newnode;
    }
}

首先对输入的合法性进行判断

创建一个新节点 对数据存储后 找到第n个节点的地址。将n+1个节点的地址给新创建的节点的next，原本存放n+1地址的p->next 这时候要存新节点的地址

头部添加 InsertElemAtHead（int data）
void Linklist::InsertElemAtHead(int data)    //在头部插入指定元素
{
    Node* newnode=new Node;
    newnode->data=data;
    Node* p=head->next;
    if(head== nullptr)
    {
        head=newnode;
    }
    newnode->next=p->next;
    p->next=newnode;
}

p指向头节点的地址，p->next 是第一个节点的地址

将第一个节点的位置给新节点的next

新节点地址赋给头节点的next

entry.content:
Kalman fiter 数学推导过程

贝叶斯

(1)bel⁡‾(xt)=∫p(xt∣ut,xt−1) bel (xt−1)dxt−1\overline{\operatorname{bel}}\left(x_{t}\right)=\int p\left(x_{t} \mid u_{t}, x_{t-1}\right) \text { bel }\left(x_{t-1}\right) d x_{t-1}\tag{1} \\ bel(xt​)=∫p(xt​∣ut​,xt−1​) bel (xt−1​)dxt−1​(1)

(2) bel (xt)=ηp(zt∣xt)bel⁡‾(xt)\begin{array}{l} \text { bel }\left(x_{t}\right)=\eta p\left(z_{t} \mid x_{t}\right) \overline{\operatorname{bel}}\left(x_{t}\right)\tag{2} \end{array}  bel (xt​)=ηp(zt​∣xt​)bel(xt​)​(2)

状态方程：

(3)xt=Atxt−1+Btut+εt\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{A}_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}+\boldsymbol{B}_{t} \boldsymbol{u}_{t}+\boldsymbol{\varepsilon}_{t}\tag{3} xt​=At​xt−1​+Bt​ut​+εt​(3)

观测方程

(4)zt=Ctxt+δt\boldsymbol{z}_{t}=\boldsymbol{C}_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t}+\delta_{t}\tag{4} zt​=Ct​xt​+δt​(4)

后验状态的均值由Atxt−1+Btut\boldsymbol{A}_{t}\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}+\boldsymbol{B}_{t}\boldsymbol{u}_{t}At​xt−1​+Bt​ut​ 给定，方差由Rt\boldsymbol{R}_{t}Rt​ 给定

(5)p(xt∣ut,xt−1)=det⁡(2πRt)−12exp⁡{−12(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)TRt−1(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)}p\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t} \mid u_{t}, \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}\right)=\operatorname{det}\left(2 \pi R_{t}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-A_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-A_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)\right\}\tag{5} p(xt​∣ut​,xt−1​)=det(2πRt​)−21​exp{−21​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)TRt−1​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)}(5)

测量概率由下面的多元正态分布给定

(6)p(zt∣xt)=det⁡(2πQt)−12exp⁡{−12(zt−Ctxt)TQt−1(zt−Ctxt)}p\left(\boldsymbol{z}_{t} \mid {x}_{t}\right)=\operatorname{det}\left(2 \pi Q_{t}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\boldsymbol{z}_{t}-C_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} Q_{t}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{z}_{t}-C_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)\right\}\tag{6} p(zt​∣xt​)=det(2πQt​)−21​exp{−21​(zt​−Ct​xt​)TQt−1​(zt​−Ct​xt​)}(6)

预测:

(7)bel(xt−1)=exp⁡{−12(xt−1−μt−1)TΣt−1−1(xt−1−μt−1)}bel( \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1})=\exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} \mathrm{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right)\right\}\tag{7} bel(xt−1​)=exp{−21​(xt−1​−μt−1​)TΣt−1−1​(xt−1​−μt−1​)}(7)

将式（1）写成高斯指数形式

(8)bel⁡‾(xt)=η∫exp⁡{−12(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)TRt−1(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)}exp⁡{−12(xt−1−μt−1)TΣt−1−1(xt−1−μt−1)}dxt−1\begin{aligned} \overline{\operatorname{bel}}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)=& \eta \int \exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{A}_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\boldsymbol{B}_{t} u_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{A}_{t} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\boldsymbol{B}_{t} u_{t}\right)\right\} \\ & \exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} \Sigma_{t-1}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right)\right\} \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1} \end{aligned}\tag{8} bel(xt​)=​η∫exp{−21​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)TRt−1​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)}exp{−21​(xt−1​−μt−1​)TΣt−1−1​(xt−1​−μt−1​)}dxt−1​​(8)

简写可以写成

(9)bel⁡‾(xt)=η∫exp⁡{−Lt}dxt−1\overline{\operatorname{bel}}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)=\eta \int \exp \left\{-L_{t}\right\} \mathrm{d}{\boldsymbol{x}}_{t-1}\tag{9} bel(xt​)=η∫exp{−Lt​}dxt−1​(9)

(10)Lt=12(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)TRt−1(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)+12(xt−1−μt−1)TΣt−1−1(xt−1−μt−1)\begin{aligned} L_{t}=& \frac{1}{2}\left(x_{t}-A_{t} x_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(x_{t}-A_{t} x_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)+\\ & \frac{1}{2}\left(x_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} \Sigma_{t-1}^{-1}\left(x_{t-1}-\mu_{t-1}\right) \end{aligned}\tag{10} Lt​=​21​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)TRt−1​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)+21​(xt−1​−μt−1​)TΣt−1−1​(xt−1​−μt−1​)​(10)

注意贝叶斯公式中的积分对象：

我们将上式分成两部分Lt=Lt(xt)+Lt(xt，xt−1)L_{t}=L_{t}(x_{t})+L_{t}(x_{t}，x_{t-1})Lt​=Lt​(xt​)+Lt​(xt​，xt−1​)

(11)Lt(xt)=+12(xt−Btut)TRt−1(xt−Btut)+12μt−1T∑t−1−1μt−1−12[AtTRt−1(xt−Btut)+∑t−1−1μt−1]T(AtTRt−1At+Σt−1−1)−1[AtTRt−1(xt−Btut)+Σt−1−1μt−1]\begin{array}{l} L_{t}\left(x_{t}\right)=+\frac{1}{2}\left(x_{t}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(x_{t}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)+\frac{1}{2} \mu_{t-1}^{\mathrm{T}} \sum_{t-1}^{-1} \mu_{t-1}- \\ \frac{1}{2}\left[A_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(x_{t}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)+\sum_{t-1}^{-1} \mu_{t-1}\right]^{\mathrm{T}}\left(A_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1} A_{t}+\Sigma_{t-1}^{-1}\right)^{-1}\left[A_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(x_{t}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)+\Sigma_{t-1}^{-1} \mu_{t-1}\right] \end{array}\tag{11} Lt​(xt​)=+21​(xt​−Bt​ut​)TRt−1​(xt​−Bt​ut​)+21​μt−1T​∑t−1−1​μt−1​−21​[AtT​Rt−1​(xt​−Bt​ut​)+∑t−1−1​μt−1​]T(AtT​Rt−1​At​+Σt−1−1​)−1[AtT​Rt−1​(xt​−Bt​ut​)+Σt−1−1​μt−1​]​(11)

那么可得：

(12)bel⁡‾(xt)=ηexp⁡{−Lt(xt)}∫exp⁡{−Lt(xt−1,xt)}dxt−1=ηexp⁡{−Lt(xt)}\begin{aligned} \overline{\operatorname{bel}}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right) &=\eta \exp \left\{-L_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)\right\} \int \exp \left\{-L_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t-1}, \boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)\right\} \mathrm{d} \boldsymbol{x}_{t-1} \\ &=\eta \exp \left\{-L_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)\right\} \end{aligned}\tag{12} bel(xt​)​=ηexp{−Lt​(xt​)}∫exp{−Lt​(xt−1​,xt​)}dxt−1​=ηexp{−Lt​(xt​)}​(12)

其表明了 bel‾(xt)\overline{bel}(x_{t})bel(xt​) 确实服从高斯分布那么其均值和方差为Lt(xt)L_{t}(x_{t})Lt​(xt​) 的极小值和曲率。

通过计算一阶导和二阶导可以轻易获得：

(13)∂Lt(xt)∂xt=Rt−1(xt−Btut)−Rt−1At(AtTRt−1At+Σt−1−1)−1[AtTRt−1(xt−Btut)+Σt−1−1μt−1]=[Rt−1−Rt−1At(AtTRt−1At+Σt−1−1)−1AtTRt−1](xt−Btut)−Rt−1At(AtTRt−1At+Σt−1−1)−1Σt−1−1μt−1\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial L_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\right)}{\partial \boldsymbol{x}_{t}}=& \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{B}_{t} \boldsymbol{u}_{t}\right)-\boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{A}_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}+\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1}\right)^{-1}\left[\boldsymbol{A}_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1}\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{B}_{t} \boldsymbol{u}_{t}\right)+\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1} \boldsymbol{\mu}_{t-1}\right] \\ =&\left[\boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1}-\boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{A}_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}+\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1}\right)^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1}\right]\left(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{B}_{t} u_{t}\right)-\\ & \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}\left(\boldsymbol{A}_{t}^{\mathrm{T}} \boldsymbol{R}_{t}^{-1} \boldsymbol{A}_{t}+\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1}\right)^{-1} \boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{t-1}^{-1} \boldsymbol{\mu}_{t-1} \end{aligned}\tag{13} ∂xt​∂Lt​(xt​)​==​Rt−1​(xt​−Bt​ut​)−Rt−1​At​(AtT​Rt−1​At​+Σt−1−1​)−1[AtT​Rt−1​(xt​−Bt​ut​)+Σt−1−1​μt−1​][Rt−1​−Rt−1​At​(AtT​Rt−1​At​+Σt−1−1​)−1AtT​Rt−1​](xt​−Bt​ut​)−Rt−1​At​(AtT​Rt−1​At​+Σt−1−1​)−1Σt−1−1​μt−1​​(13)

使用求逆引理(inversion lemma)

(14)Rt−1−Rt−1At(At⊤Rt−1At+Σt−1−1)−1AtTRt−1=(Rt+AtΣt−1AtT)−1R_{t}^{-1}-R_{t}^{-1} A_{t}\left(A_{t}^{\top} R_{t}^{-1} A_{t}+\Sigma_{t-1}^{-1}\right)^{-1} A_{t}^{T} R_{t}^{-1}=\left(R_{t}+A_{t} \Sigma_{t-1} A_{t}^{T}\right)^{-1}\tag{14} Rt−1​−Rt−1​At​(At⊤​Rt−1​At​+Σt−1−1​)−1AtT​Rt−1​=(Rt​+At​Σt−1​AtT​)−1(14)

取一阶导为0可以得到：

(15)xt=Btut+Atμt−1\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{B}_{t}u_{t}+A_{t}\mu_{t-1}\tag{15} xt​=Bt​ut​+At​μt−1​(15)

二阶导可以得到：

(16)∂2Lt(xt)∂xt2=(AtΣt−1−1AtT+Rt)−1\frac{\partial^{2} L_{t}\left(x_{t}\right)}{\partial x_{t}^{2}}=\left(A_{t} \Sigma_{t-1}^{-1} A_{t}^{\mathrm{T}}+R_{t}\right)^{-1}\tag{16} ∂xt2​∂2Lt​(xt​)​=(At​Σt−1−1​AtT​+Rt​)−1(16)

其逆矩阵就是bel‾(xt)\overline{bel}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})bel(xt​)的协方差。

如上可以获得卡尔曼滤波的预测部分

(17)μˉt=Atμt−1+BtutΣˉt=AtΣt−1AtT+Rt\begin{array}{l} \bar{\mu}_{t}=A_{t} \mu_{t-1}+B_{t} u_{t} \\ \bar{\Sigma}_{t}=A_{t} \Sigma_{t-1} A_{t}^{T}+R_{t} \end{array}\tag{17} μˉ​t​=At​μt−1​+Bt​ut​Σˉt​=At​Σt−1​AtT​+Rt​​(17)

更新

Kalman Filter

首先回忆一下贝叶斯滤波的过程

预测：

bel‾(xt)=∫p(xt∣ut,xt−1) bel (xt−1)dxt−1\overline { bel }\left(x_{t}\right)=\int p\left(x_{t} | u_{t}, x_{t-1}\right) \text { bel }\left(x_{t-1}\right) d x_{t-1} bel(xt​)=∫p(xt​∣ut​,xt−1​) bel (xt−1​)dxt−1​

p(x)∼N(μ,σ2)p(x)=12πσe−12(x−μ)2σ2p(x) \sim N\left(\mu, \sigma^{2}\right)\\ p(x)=\frac{1}{\sqrt{2 \pi} \sigma} e^{-\frac{1}{2} \frac{(x-\mu)^{2}}{\sigma^{2}}} p(x)∼N(μ,σ2)p(x)=2π​σ1​e−21​σ2(x−μ)2​

p(x)∼N(μ,Σ):p(x)=1(2π)d/2∣Σ∣1/2e−12(x−μ)tΣ−1(x−μ)\begin{array}{l} p(\mathbf{x}) \sim N(\mu, \Sigma): \\ p(\mathbf{x})=\frac{1}{(2 \pi)^{d / 2}|\Sigma|^{1 / 2}} e^{-\frac{1}{2}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)^{t} \Sigma^{-1}(\mathbf{x}-\mu)} \end{array} p(x)∼N(μ,Σ):p(x)=(2π)d/2∣Σ∣1/21​e−21​(x−μ)tΣ−1(x−μ)​

例子：离散卡尔曼滤波

状态：

xt=Atxt−1+Btut+εtx_{t}=A_{t} x_{t-1}+B_{t} u_{t}+\varepsilon_{t}xt​=At​xt−1​+Bt​ut​+εt​

At,Bt,CtA_{t},B_{t},C_{t}At​,Bt​,Ct​ 分别是状态转移矩阵，控制对状态造成的影响，真实值到测量的转变。

状态转移概率：p(xt∣ut,xt−1)p\left(x_{t} | u_{t}, x_{t-1}\right)p(xt​∣ut​,xt−1​)

p(xi∣ui,xt−1)=det⁡(2πRt)−12exp⁡{−12(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)TRt−1(xt−Atxt−1−Btut)}p\left(x_{i} | u_{i}, x_{t-1}\right)=\operatorname{det}\left(2 \pi R_{t}\right)^{-\frac{1}{2}} \exp \left\{-\frac{1}{2}\left(x_{t}-A_{t} x_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)^{\mathrm{T}} R_{t}^{-1}\left(x_{t}-A_{t} x_{t-1}-B_{t} u_{t}\right)\right\} p(xi​∣ui​,xt−1​)=det(2πRt​)−21​exp{−21​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)TRt−1​(xt​−At​xt−1​−Bt​ut​)}

卡尔曼滤波算法

1: Algorithm Kalman_Filter（μt−1,Σt−1,ut,zt\mu_{t-1},\Sigma_{t-1},u_{t},z_{t}μt−1​,Σt−1​,ut​,zt​）

2: μˉt=Atμt−1+Btut\bar{\mu}_{t}=A_{t} \mu_{t-1}+B_{t} u_{t}μˉ​t​=At​μt−1​+Bt​ut​

5: μt=μˉt+Kt(zt−Ctμˉt)\mu_{t}=\bar{\mu}_{t}+K_{t}\left(z_{t}-C_{t} \bar{\mu}_{t}\right)μt​=μˉ​t​+Kt​(zt​−Ct​μˉ​t​)

6: Σt=(I−KtCt)Σˉt\Sigma_{t}=\left(I-K_{t} C_{t}\right) \bar{\Sigma}_{t}Σt​=(I−Kt​Ct​)Σˉt​

function [x,P] = kf_predict(x,P,A,Q,B,u)

  %
  % Check arguments
  %
  if nargin < 3
    A = [];
  end
  if nargin < 4
    Q = [];
  end
  if nargin < 5
    B = [];
  end
  if nargin < 6
    u = [];
  end
 
  %
  % Apply defaults
  %
  if isempty(A)
    A = eye(size(x,1));
  end
  if isempty(Q)
    Q = zeros(size(x,1));
  end
  if isempty(B) & ~isempty(u)
    B = eye(size(x,1),size(u,1));
  end
  %
  % Perform prediction
  %
  if isempty(u)
    x = A * x;
    P = A * P * A' + Q;
  else
    x = A * x + B * u;
    P = A * P * A' + Q;
  end
  
  
function [X,P,K,IM,IS,LH] = kf_update(X,P,y,H,R)
  %
  % Check which arguments are there
  %
  if nargin < 5
    error('Too few arguments');
  end
  %
  % update step
  %
  IM = H*X;
  IS = (R + H*P*H');
  K = P*H'/IS;
  X = X + K * (y-IM);
  P = P - K*IS*K';
if nargout > 5
  LH = gauss_pdf(y,IM,IS);
end

Introduction to ADC

The STM32F4xx series generally have 3 ADCs. These ADCs can be used independently or in dual / triple mode (increasing the sampling rate). The STM32F4 ADC is a 12-bit successive approximation type analog-to-digital converter. It has 19 channels and can measure signals from 16 external sources, 2 internal sources, and Vbat channels. The A / D conversion of these channels can be performed in single, continuous, scan or discontinuous mode. The result of ADC can be stored in 16-bit data register with left or right alignment. The analog watchdog feature allows the application to detect whether the input voltage exceeds a user-defined high / low threshold.

ADC-CR1


The SCAN bit of ADC_CR1, which is used to set the scan mode, is set and cleared by software. If it is set to 1, the scan mode is used, if it is 0, the scan mode is turned off. In scan mode, the channel selected by the ADC_SQRx or ADC_JSQRx register is converted. If EOCIE or JEOCIE is set, the EOC or JEOC interrupt will be generated only after the last channel conversion is completed.

ADC_CR1 [25:24] is used to set the resolution of the ADC, the detailed correspondence is shown in the figure

ADC-CR2


The ADON bit is used to switch the AD converter. The CONT bit is used to set whether to perform continuous conversion, we use a single conversion, so the CONT bit must be 0. ALIGN is used to set the data alignment, we use right alignment, this bit is set to 0.

EXTEN [1: 0] is used to set the external trigger enable of the regular channel, the detailed setting relationship is shown in the figure

entry.content:
Problem Description

  1. Create motor control system
    a. Setup first timer. It must have 2 output PWM lines for control motor speed of motion.
    b. In Simulink add Serial send block. For set speed of motion (PWM period %) use slider gain (with values from -100 to 100).
    c. On reading byte from Simulink set control signals for motor.
  2. Setup second timer. It must have 2 input line from encoder.
  3. Counted pulses from encoder send to Simulink.
    For receive data from microcontroller use Simulink model, and show received data in scope.

Task analysis

After analyzing the entire task, the main solution：

Enable TIM3 PWM output mode Configure channel 1 (PA6), channel 2 (PA7), and control the high and low levels of PA5 and PA6. Matlab sends a number of -100-100 to indicate the direction and speed of the motor. After the serial port receives the data, it controls the motor after the data is processed, and then processes the encoded signal output by the motor through the TIM4 encoding function to obtain the speed of the motor, and Resend to Matlab via serial communication

Tim PWM mode and configuration method


The general-purpose timer can use the GPIO pin for pulse output. When it is configured as a comparison output or a PWM output function, the capture / compare register TIMx_CCR is used as a comparison function, which is referred to as a comparison register below.
Here is a direct example to illustrate the working process of the PWM output of the timer: if the pulse counter TIMx_CNT is configured to count up, and the reload register TIMx_ARR is configured to N, that is, the current count value X of the TIMx_CNT is continuously accumulated under the drive of the TIMxCLK clock source When the value X of TIMx_CNT is greater than N, the value of TIMx_CNT will be reset to 0 and counted again.
While counting TIMxCNT, the count value X of TIMxCNT will be compared with the value A pre-stored in the comparison register TIMx_CCR. When the value X of the pulse counter TIMx_CNT is less than the value A of the comparison register TIMx_CCR, the high level (or low Level), conversely, when the value X of the pulse counter is greater than or equal to the value A of the comparison register, a low level (or high level) is output.
In this way, the output pulse period is the value (N + 1) stored in the reload register TIMx_ARR multiplied by the clock period of the trigger pulse, and the pulse width is the value A of the comparison register TIMx_CCR multiplied by the clock period of the trigger pulse, that is The duty cycle of the output PWM is A / (N + 1).

Encoder interface mode


When both AB are the same, a square wave is output, and the phase difference is 90 °. We can judge the forward and reverse by judging the order of the level transition of the two phases of AB, and we can also determine the number of level transitions of any one phase. Rotation speed

TIMx capture/compare mode register 1 (TIMx_CCMR1)

Bits 9:8 CC2S[1:0]: Capture/Compare 2 selection

This bit-field defines the direction of the channel (input/output) as well as the used input.
00: CC2 channel is configured as output
01: CC2 channel is configured as input, IC2 is mapped on TI2
10: CC2 channel is configured as input, IC2 is mapped on TI1
11: CC2 channel is configured as input, IC2 is mapped on TRC. This mode is working only if
an internal trigger input is selected through the TS bit (TIMx_SMCR register)
Note: CC2S bits are writable only when the channel is OFF (CC2E = 0 in TIMx_CCER).

Bits 1:0 CC1S: Capture/Compare 1 selection

This bit-field defines the direction of the channel (input/output) as well as the used input.
00: CC1 channel is configured as output.
01: CC1 channel is configured as input, IC1 is mapped on TI1.
10: CC1 channel is configured as input, IC1 is mapped on TI2.
11: CC1 channel is configured as input, IC1 is mapped on TRC. This mode is working only if
an internal trigger input is selected through TS bit (TIMx_SMCR register)
Note: CC1S bits are writable only when the channel is OFF (CC1E = 0 in TIMx_CCER).

TIMx capture/compare enable register (TIMx_CCER)

Bit 4 CC2E: Capture/Compare 2 output enable.

refer to CC1E description

Bit 0 CC1E: Capture/Compare 1 output enable.

CC1 channel configured as output:
0: Off - OC1 is not active
1: On - OC1 signal is output on the corresponding output pin
CC1 channel configured as input:
This bit determines if a capture of the counter value can actually be done into the input
capture/compare register 1 (TIMx_CCR1) or not.
0: Capture disabled
1: Capture enabled

{}

{}
}

/****  Serial port initialization  ******/
/**** pa2 pa3 multiplexing function****/

{
RCC->AHB1ENR |= RCC_AHB1ENR_GPIOAEN|
	              RCC_AHB1ENR_GPIOBEN;//open clock
GPIOA->MODER =0x000000A0;//Multiple function mode 	
GPIOA->AFR[0]=0x00007700;//
RCC->APB1ENR |= RCC_APB1ENR_USART2EN;//usart2 enable
USART2->BRR = APB1/baud;//Baud rate
USART2->CR1 = USART_CR1_UE|//usart2 enbale
	            USART_CR1_TE|//
	            USART_CR1_RE|//Send and receive enable
	            USART_CR1_RXNEIE;//Interrupt enable
NVIC_EnableIRQ(USART2_IRQn);//Configuration interrupt		
}

/**** delay function ****/
void delay_ms(uint16_t time)     
{    
  uint16_t i=0;    
  while(time--)     
  {    
    i=12000;    
    while(i--);    
  }    
}
/********* Motor control detection section *************/
//TIM4_Encoder_Init,Tim4_CH1(PB6);Tim4_CH2(PB7)

void TIM4_Encoder_Init(uint16_t arr,uint16_t psc)
{

 RCC->APB1ENR |= (4<<0);  //TIM4 clock enabled
 GPIOB->MODER |= 1 << (6*2 + 1) | 1 << (7*2 + 1); ; // Reuse output mode
 GPIOB->AFR[0] |= (uint32_t)0x22000000; // Reuse as TIM4	
 TIM4->ARR=arr;            
 TIM4->PSC=psc;  
	
 TIM4->CCMR1 &= 0xFCFC;//clear 0
 TIM4->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_CC1S_0;//Capture/Compare 1 Selection
 TIM4->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_CC2S_0;

 TIM4->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC1M_0;//Output Compare 1 Mode
 TIM4->CCMR1 |= TIM_CCMR1_OC1M_1;
	
 TIM4->CCER |= TIM_CCER_CC1E; // Enable comparison output
 TIM4->CCER |= TIM_CCER_CC2E;
 
 TIM4->EGR |= TIM_EGR_UG;  //Update

 TIM4->SMCR &= 0xFFF8;
 TIM4->SMCR |= TIM_SMCR_SMS_0;
 TIM4->SMCR |= TIM_SMCR_SMS_1;
 
 TIM4->CNT = 0;
 TIM4->CR1 |= TIM_CR1_CEN;  // Counter enable            
}


/********   TIM3 Two PWM output control speed *************/
void init_TIM3_PWM(uint16_t psc,uint16_t arr)//control pin 67 //psc arr fre set，ch1 ch2 Duty cycle
{
  SCB->AIRCR = 0x05FA0000 | 0x400;  //Interrupt priority group preemption: response = 3: 1
  GPIOA->MODER |= 0X0001A400;//pc67 second function 5 8 out
        
  GPIOA->OSPEEDR |= 0x0000f000;//speed 100m
  GPIOA->PUPDR |= 0x00005000;//up   
  GPIOA->AFR[0] |= 0x22000000;//pc67 second function AF2
  RCC->APB1ENR |= (1<<1); //open TIM3 clock
  TIM3->PSC = psc; //
  TIM3->ARR = arr;  //
  TIM3->EGR |= 1; //Generate an update event
  TIM3->CCMR1 |= 0x6060;//PWM mode 1
  TIM3->CCER |= 0x1111;//Enable comparison output
  TIM3->CCMR1 |= 0x0808;//Start preload
  TIM3->CR1 |= 1; //start
}

/********* Motor speed and reverse control function********/
void Motor_Speed_Control(int8_t motorSpeed)         
{
    int16_t speed = 0 ;        
        
       if(motorSpeed>100)  speed = 100;
	else if (motorSpeed<-100)  speed = -100;
     else  speed = motorSpeed;
        if(speed == 0)
        {
        GPIOA->ODR |=GPIO_ODR_OD5;//pa5 high level
				GPIOA->ODR |=GPIO_ODR_OD8;//Pa8 high level 
				TIM3->CCR1 = speed *0;//ch1 no output  
				TIM3->CCR2 = speed *0;//ch2 no output	
        }
            else if(speed > 0)//Forward rotation, 
                {
									GPIOA->ODR |=GPIO_ODR_OD5;
									GPIOA->ODR &=~(GPIO_ODR_OD8);//
									TIM3->CCR1 = speed *T_pwm;//ch1  pwm 
									TIM3->CCR2 = speed *0;//ch2 
                }
						else
								{
									GPIOA->ODR |=GPIO_ODR_OD8;//backgroud
									GPIOA->ODR &=~(GPIO_ODR_OD5);
									TIM3->CCR1 = -speed * 0;//ch1
									TIM3->CCR2 = -speed * T_pwm;//ch2
								}
}

//Read count
int TIM4_Encoder_Read(void)
{

    return  (int)TIM4 ->CNT;;           //Data type conversion
                             // Record the number of edge changes (a grid is recorded 4 times)
}




/****** Serial interrupt function******/
void USART2_IRQHandler(void)
{
	
	//Send part	
	if (USART2->SR & USART_SR_TXE)//Txe register is empty Send data
{
if(buffer_size > current_send_byte)
{
USART2->DR = buffer[current_send_byte];
current_send_byte++;
}
else
{
USART2->CR2 &= ~USART_CR1_TXEIE;
current_send_byte = 0;
buffer_size = 0;
}
}

if(USART2->SR & USART_SR_RXNE)//Receive interrupt indicator Trigger receive
{
//Receiving part//
Motor_Speed_Control(USART2->DR);
}
}


/***** Serial port sending function******/
void Send_buffer(uint8_t *buff, uint16_t count)
{
for(uint16_t i = 0; i < count; i++)
{
buffer[buffer_size + i] = buff[i];
}
buffer_size += count;
USART2->CR1 |= USART_CR1_TXEIE;
}

/******Speed real-time transmission function*********/
void Init_tim10(uint16_t arr,uint16_t psc)
{
//OPEN TIM10
RCC->APB2ENR |=1<<17;
TIM10->CNT=0;//CLEAR
TIM10->PSC = psc;
TIM10->ARR = arr;
/*Allow update interrupt enable*/
TIM10->DIER |= 1<<0;
/*Enable basic timer interrupt*/
NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIM1_UP_TIM10_IRQn);
/*Turn on counter enable*/
TIM10->CR1 |= 1<<0;
}
void TIM1_UP_TIM10_IRQHandler(void)
{
TIM10->SR &=~TIM_SR_UIF;
static uint8_t i=0;
if(++i==100) i=0;
int8_t s= TIM4_Encoder_Read();
buffer[0]='A';
buffer[1]=i;
buffer[2]=s;
if(1)
{
Send_buffer(buffer,3);
}
}

int main()
{

T_pwm=1000/100;
clock_set();
usart2_Init(USART_BAUDRATE);
init_TIM3_PWM(84-1,1000);//1khz	
TIM4_Encoder_Init(255,0);//255
Init_tim10(10000,84-1);
while(1)
{
}	
}

Conclusion

Through this experiment, I mainly learned to use the stm32 output PWM to control the motor, use the data received by the serial port to modify the PWM duty cycle, thereby changing the speed of the motor, and use the encoder function of stm32 to carry out the speed of the motor. entry.title: STM 32 定时器的使用
entry.content:
In Proteus in an existing project, remove virtual terminal, add COMPIM (COM port Physical interface model) and connect it to the microcontroller. In COMPIM set correct real physical port and baudrates.
Devices in project:
• Microcontroller;
• 2 LEDs;
• Button;
• COMPIM.
In Keil, supplement the project for the microcontroller. Setup 2 timers with interrupt on update, one for reading states of button, second for periodic send data to other device (program in out case).
Parts of task:

  1. Setup first timer with interrupt on update. In interrupt read state of button and change LEDs state depend on button.
  2. Setup second timer with interrupt on update. It must be 100 interrupts is 1 second. In the interrupt handler increase some variables and call USART send function for send array (one item of the array must be increased variable).
    For receive data from microcontroller use Simulink model, and show received data in scope.

This experiment is mainly to learn the timer configuration using stm32.

1.Introduction to TIM

Among them the basic timer includes TIM6, TIM7, its structure is the simplest, also has the most basic timing function, one is for basic timing, generating time base, and the other is for driving DAC digital-to-analog converter. Among them, there are 10 general-purpose timers including TIME2-TIME5 and TIME9-TIME14. In addition to the functions of the basic timer, the general-purpose timer also has input capture, output comparison, and PWM functions. he advanced timers include TIM1, TIM8; The related common register functions of the timer are as follows:

1.1 Clock source selection register (TIMx_SMCR)

There are 4 clock sources for the timer:
-Internal clock (CK_INT)
-External clock mode 1: External input pin (TIx)
-External clock mode 2: External trigger input (ETR), only applicable to TIM2, TIM3, TIM4
-Internal trigger input (ITRx): Make A timer to be prescaler of B timer (A provides clock for B)
This is selected by setting the relevant bit of TIMx_SMCR. The internal clock (CK_INT) comes from the APB1 or APB2 bus

1.2 Prescaler register (TIMx_PSC)

This register is used to divide the clock and then provide it to the counter as the clock of the counter.

The 16-bit space stores the frequency division coefficient.

1.3 Timer count register (TIMx_CNT)

It stores the current count value of the timer.

1.4 Automatic reload register (TIMx_ARR)

This register corresponds to two registers in the physical structure, one can be operated by the programmer, and the other is invisible and inoperable ARM called it as the shadow register. The shadow registers are actually in effect.
According to the setting of the APRE bit in the TIMx_CR1 register: when APRE = 0, the contents of the preload register can be transferred to the shadow register at any time, and the two are connected at this time; and when APRE = 1, at each update event (UEV) Before the contents of the preload register (ARR) are transferred to the shadow register.

1.5 DMA / Interrupt Enable Register (TIMx_DIER)

Here we only use the last bit: update interrupt enable (UIE: update interrupt enable), set to 1 instead to allow interrupts caused by update events

1.6 Control Register 1 (TIMx_CR1)

We only need to use the last bit: the counter enable bit (CEN: counter enable), instead it must be set to 1 to enable the counter to start counting.

1.7 Status register (TIMx_SR)

![]

This register is used to mark whether various events / interrupts related to the current timer have occurred

Code

#include "stm32f4xx.h"
#include "stm32f4xx_hal_gpio.h"
#include "stm32f4xx_hal_rcc.h"
#include <math.h>
//define Internal RC frequencies
#define XTAL 16000000UL

//define busses prescalers
#define AHB_PRE 1

#define M_pi 3.1415926535897323846

void clock_set()
{

RCC->CFGR&=~RCC_CFGR_HPRE_Msk;

RCC->PLLCFGR|=8<<RCC_PLLCFGR_PLLM_Pos;
RCC->PLLCFGR&=~RCC_PLLCFGR_PLLN_Msk;
RCC->PLLCFGR|=84<<RCC_PLLCFGR_PLLN_Pos;
RCC->PLLCFGR&=~RCC_PLLCFGR_PLLP_Msk; //SET PLLM PLLN PLLP
RCC->CR|=RCC_CR_PLLON;//OPEN PLL
while((RCC->CR&RCC_CR_PLLRDY)==0)//WAIT PLL START
{}
RCC->CFGR&=(uint32_t)((uint32_t)~(RCC_CFGR_SW));
RCC->CFGR|=RCC_CFGR_SW_PLL;
while((RCC->CFGR&RCC_CFGR_SWS)!=RCC_CFGR_SWS_PLL)
{}
}

void usart2_Init(uint32_t baud)
{
RCC->AHB1ENR |= RCC_AHB1ENR_GPIOAEN|
	              RCC_AHB1ENR_GPIOBEN;//open clock
GPIOA->MODER =0x000000A0;//pa2 pa3 	Multiple function mode
GPIOA->AFR[0]=0x00007700;//
GPIOB->MODER=0x00005555;//GPIOB
RCC->APB1ENR |= RCC_APB1ENR_USART2EN;//usart2 enable
USART2->BRR = APB1/baud;//Baudrate
USART2->CR1 = USART_CR1_UE|//usart2enable
	            USART_CR1_TE|//
	            USART_CR1_RE|//transmit receive enable
	            USART_CR1_RXNEIE;//Interrupt enable
NVIC_EnableIRQ(USART2_IRQn);//Configuration interrupt	
}

void SendByte(uint8_t dat)
{
	USART2->DR = dat;
	while((USART2->SR & USART_SR_TC) == 0);
}

void Send_buffer(uint8_t *buff,uint16_t count)
{
for (int i=0;i<count;i++)
	{
		SendByte(*buff);
		*buff++;
	}
}

void delay_ms(uint16_t time)     
{    
  uint16_t i=0;    
  while(time--)     
  {    
    i=12000;    
    while(i--);    
  }    
}
void USART2_IRQHandler(void)
{
	if(USART2->SR & USART_SR_RXNE)
	{
		buffer[buffer_size] = USART2->DR;
		buffer_size++;
		if(buffer[buffer_size-1] == 'k')
		{
			GPIOB->ODR &= ~(1 <<0); //LEN0 OFF
			buffer_size = 0;
			USART2->CR1 &= ~USART_CR1_RE;
		}
		else if(USART2->DR == 'l')
		{
			GPIOB->ODR |= 1 << 0; // LED0 ON
			buffer_size = 0;
			USART2->CR1 &= ~USART_CR1_RE;
		}
	}

void TIM1_BRK_TIM9_IRQHandler(void)
{
TIM9->SR &=~TIM_SR_UIF;
	if(!(GPIOB->IDR & GPIO_IDR_ID9))
	{
	GPIOB->BSRR |= GPIO_BSRR_BS1;
	GPIOB->BSRR |= GPIO_BSRR_BR0;
	}
	else
	{
	GPIOB->BSRR |= GPIO_BSRR_BS0;
	GPIOB->BSRR |= GPIO_BSRR_BR1;
	}

void TIM1_UP_TIM10_IRQHandler(void)
{
  TIM10->SR &=~TIM_SR_UIF;
	static uint8_t i=0;
	if(++i==100) i=0;
	double s=sin(i*2*M_pi/100);
	buffer[0]='A';
	buffer[1]=i;
	buffer[2]=(int8_t)(s*100);
	if(1)
	{
	Send_buffer(buffer,3);
	}

void Init_tim9(uint16_t arr,uint16_t psc)
{
	//OPEN TIM9
	RCC->APB2ENR |=1<<16;
	TIM9->CNT=0;//CLEAR 
	TIM9->PSC = psc;
	TIM9->ARR = arr;
/*Allow update interrupt enable*/
	TIM9->DIER |= 1<<0;
/*Enable basic timer interrupt*/
  NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIM1_BRK_TIM9_IRQn);
/*Turn on counter enable*/
  TIM9->CR1 |= 1<<0;
}
void Init_tim10(uint16_t arr,uint16_t psc)
{
	//OPEN TIM10
	RCC->APB2ENR |=1<<17;
	TIM10->CNT=0;//CLEAR 
	TIM10->PSC = psc;
	TIM10->ARR = arr;
/*Allow update interrupt enable*/
	TIM10->DIER |= 1<<0;
/*Enable basic timer interrupt*/
  NVIC_EnableIRQ(TIM1_UP_TIM10_IRQn);

  TIM10->CR1 |= 1<<0;

int main()
{
	clock_set();
	usart2_Init(USART_BAUDRATE);
	Init_tim9(1000,84-1);//fre=84000000/84/1000    1000hz
	Init_tim10(10000,84-1);//fre=84000000/84/10000 100hz
while(1)
{}

Simulation

Conclusion

Through this experiment, I learned the configuration of timers and the use of timer interrupts. And use Matlab simulink to observe the simulation situation through the virtual serial port. During the experiment, I also encountered some problems. Finding information through the Internet made me clearer about the whole process.
